emotionalSupportPlan.title: Personalized Emotional Support Plan
emotionalSupportPlan.description: Generate a support plan based on {{studentName}}'s latest emotional records.
emotionalSupportPlan.studentIdMissing: Student ID not found. Cannot generate plan.
